ygData.subject: Re: MSRP
ygData.msgSnippet: In Oasis, the same gypsy camp that sells combine sells Compasses.  I don t know exactly how to explain it, when you run at the camp from the hunting point next
ygData.messageBody:
In Oasis, the same gypsy camp that sells combine sells Compasses. I
don't know exactly how to explain it, when you run at the camp from the
hunting point next to the water she is the one on the back left. Bad
directions I know. She sells them to me with 65 charisma for about 3.4
pp I would say.

This is about the same price it costs me to make them. Which means
tinkering a compass is a moot point.

-Kryogen

--- mstokes <mstokes@...> wrote:
> From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
> Murrisa Sandwhisper in Northern Ro sells compasses
> for about 2 plat. The good
> news is that killing Dervs hurts your faction with
> her, so she won't deal with
> most people in the area. (Who hangs out in Ro and
> doesn't kill Dervs?) I
> managed to sell a few in the Qeynos area for 4-5pp,
> but haven't been tinkering
> much since I'm about as far away from my tinkering
> supplies that I can get :)
> Cheer
> Malkin
>
> Master Brewer, Baker, Tinkerer (Talk about picking
> the wrong skills)
>
> MadGrizzle wrote:
>
> > From: MadGrizzle <MadGrizzle@...>
> >
> > I am by no means condoning price fixing, however,
> i would like to know at
> > what price are you selling compasses. It costs a
> bit over 3pp to make (I
> > haven't failed yet..knock on wood). I'm currently
> selling for 5 pp, most
> > people who want one have no problem paying the 5
> pp. I have found some
> > people who will only pay 4pp, to whom I tell to
> come back to me when you
> > get a bit more frustrated hitting sense heading.
> However, I do manage to
> > sell one, maybe two a day. I here that you can
> buy compasses from gypsies
> > in North Karana but I haven't made the trip to
> check it out (last time I
> > was there i got mauled by a grif). I also heard
> you could get them in
> > Kithicor forest but I went through all the shops
> and didn't find any. I'll
> > go to the gypsies and check them out then head to
> lavastorm to see if they
> > have them also.
> >
> >
>
>
>
